caption.title: Biomass (mean ± SE, n = 3) of different microbial groups (nmols g −1) and PLFAs ratios in inoculated (+AMF) and non-inoculated (−AMF) with (+OIL) and without (−OIL) essential oil pots. AMF indicates a significant effect of inoculation and OIL indicates a significant effect of oil addition revealed by a generalized Two-way ANOVA (Distribution: Gamma. Link function: Log). *** P < 0.001, ** P < 0.01, * P < 0.05.
